001package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.animation;
002
003import java.awt.Point;
004import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
005import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
006
007/**
008 * This class animates an image sliding directly from one point to another.
009 *
010 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
011 */
012public class SlideAnimation extends AbstractAnimation {
013
014    public SlideAnimation(BufferedImage image, Point start, Point end, long duration) {
015        super(image, start, end, duration);
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae) {
020        lastTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
021        if (isActive()) {
022            float ratio = (float) (lastTime - startTime) / (endTime - startTime);
023            ratio = Math.max(ratio, 0.001f);
024
025            float dx = end.x - start.x;
026            float dy = end.y - start.y;
027            dx *= ratio;
028            dy *= ratio;
029
030            label.setLocation(start.x + Math.round(dx), start.y + Math.round(dy));
031            label.invalidate();
032        }
033    }
034
035}
